snippet: A Pennsylvania woman was charged Monday with homicide after the authorities said she pushed her 1-year-old son off a bridge into a river.
abstract: Johnesha Perry of Pennsylvania is charged with homicide after pushing her 1-year-old son Zymeir Perry off bridge into river before jumping in herself.
lead_paragraph: A Pennsylvania woman was charged Monday with homicide after the authorities said she pushed her 1-year-old son off a bridge into a river.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Woman Is Accused of Throwing Toddler From Bridge
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Woman Is Accused of Throwing Toddler From Bridge
